divs: Sighting DetailsI parked here at home then got outta the car, and I immediately saw this bright white light, and it was maybe about four to five thousand feet above us (VERY close!).��� It was closer than a plane, and it was NOT moving like a plane; it was weaving a little bit, side to side, as it flew slowly over top of us. I grabbed the binoculars and followed it for a few seconds, seeing a sphere with all this glowing light coming out of it.��� When I went for the camera, though, it slowly, slowly fizzled out to nothing - despite my pleading aloud for it to stay.��� (I guess it was somebody who didn't want their picture taken!��� ;)) Anyway, I saw a gray craft last September, and I just knew intuitively that it was Arcturians.��� This time, though, I didn't get a feeling about WHO it was, but I know they were good and loving.
